Header: Wimal has fever: Request by the prison denied
Content: The Colombo National Hospital stated that the leader of National Freedom Front, Parliamentarian Wimal Weerawansa who is currently in hospital, is suffering from a fever. Speaking to our news team, its deputy director, Specialist Doctor, Samindhi Samarakoon stated that the parliamentarian is currently receiving treatment for the fever which he contracted last afternoon. The Department of Prisons requested Colombo National Hospital to transfer the parliamentarian to the prison once the MP started to consume solid foods. However, the Colombo National Hospital denied the request as the MP is suffering from fever. Parliamentarian Wimal Weerawansa concluded his hunger strike last Thursday. The MP was later on transferred from the 45th ward to the 43rd following the improvement of his health condition.
